description:
When use regular use creating floating ips works fine, however when I trying floating_ips.list() I receive the error "novaclient.exceptions.ClientException: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500)".

Creating and listing as admin user works as expected.
title: Can create floating ip as regular user but cannot list

comments.content:
When use regular use creating floating ips works fine, however when I trying floating_ips.list() I receive the error "novaclient.exceptions.ClientException: The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500)".

Creating and listing as admin user works as expected.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~andrewsben

comments.content: What version are you using?  Do you get an error in nova logs?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content: We cannot solve the issue you reported without more information. Could you please provide the requested information ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: This bug lacks the necessary information to effectively reproduce and fix it, therefore it has been closed. Feel free to reopen the bug by providing the requested information and set the bug status back to ''New''.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
